segments.text: I notice the woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such a mess being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, taking cookies while her back is turned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how oblivious she is to everything going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking his safety for a few cookies, and she's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting wetter and more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to intervene before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll ever notice the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a recipe for disaster, and she's completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR
